tasks.task: Renting chicken packages and setting up coops.
subtasks: Discussing rental options (two or four hens, three or six months).
Explaining the included items (coop, hens, feeder, water, feed).
Highlighting the goal of providing fresh eggs on day one.
Describing the coop design for easy access (standing upright, nest boxes).
Mentioning the ability to move the coop with wheels.
Addressing additional fees (chicken replacement, mileage).
Introducing a senior citizen Bantam chicken rental package.
Highlighting the Bantams' smaller size and egg-laying capacity.
Mentioning website availability for pricing and details.
Describing the coop dimensions (five feet by eight feet).
Detailing the door mechanism and releasing the cable.
Adjusting the coop for outdoor use (unfenced backyard).
Ensuring easy access to feed and water.
Managing the chickens from standing position.
Soliciting a $100 down payment for coop construction.
Providing contact information for website (farmerbrad.com).
